channel.title: workshops on Mind the Math
channel.description: Recent content in workshops on Mind the Math

item.title: General Information About Workshops
item.description: Workshop Structure Our workshops are tailored to meet the needs of each audience, and we offer a flexible pricing model to accommodate your budget. We offer three progressive workshop options: Learn (60-90m): This foundation is a lecture-style presentation, followed by a Q&A session. For groups under 25 particpants, there is no additional charge. Practice (Half-Day): In this option, we’ll go through a hands-on practical component to help participants get a better understanding of the material.

item.title: Reproducible Research Papers
item.description: Making Your Research Reproducible with LaTeX and Containerization

item.title: Git Fundamentals: Version-Control for Scientists
item.description: The Basics of Git and Repository Hosting Services for Better Research Tracking and Collaboration

item.title: Making Effective Posters and Presentations with LaTeX
item.description: Enhance Your Presentation Skills and Improve Your Research Communication with LaTeX

item.title: Deploying JupyterHub with Docker-Compose: A Workshop for Academic Teams
item.description: Learn to deploy JupyterHub using docker-compose to improve computational reproducibility, facilitate team collaboration, and provide a flexible, OS-agnostic interface for research.

item.title: Effective Use of Jupyter Notebooks in Research Process
item.description: Learn the best practices for effectively using Jupyter notebooks in the research process to better organize and streamline your work.

item.title: Organizing Research with MLflow
item.description: Learn to use MLflow to track experiments and reproduce results in your research.

item.title: Visualizing Data with Matplotlib
item.description: Matplotlib for Effective Communication of Research with Data Visualization

item.title: Sharing Research with the Public: Interactive Web Applications
item.description: Learn to share your research with the broader public by creating interactive web applications.
